original: Johansson, Magnus Allan, kyrkoherde, Jung^skola, f. 28/8/06 i Borås av slöjdlär. Carl J. o. Sofia Jakobsson. G. 35 m. Ruth Bengtsson. Adopt :barn: Kerstin f. 35, Irene o. Marianne 41. — Studiex. i Borås 25, teol. fil. ex. i Lund 29, teol. kand. 32, prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Skara stift 33. Past:adj. i Götene 33-34, v. pastor i N. Ving 34-37, pred. v. Stora Ekebergs sanat. 36-46, kommin. i Hän-dene 37-46, kyrkoh. i Jung ’sed. 46. Ordf. i skolråd, kyrkoråd o. kyrkostämma.
translated: Johansson, Magnus Allan, clergyman, born August 28, 1906 in Borås to the woodworking teacher Carl J. and Sofia Jakobsson. Married in 1935 to Ruth Bengtsson. Adopted children: Kerstin (born 1935), Irene, and Marianne (both born 1941). Completed high school in Borås in 1925, theology degree in Lund in 1929, theology candidate in 1932, practical theology exam and ordained as a priest in Skara diocese in 1933. Assistant pastor in Götene from 1933-1934, vicar in N. Ving from 1934-1937, preacher at Stora Ekeberg's sanatorium from 1936-1946, curate in Händene from 1937-1946, and parish priest in Jung starting in 1946. He was also the chairman of the school council, church council, and church meeting.
